content: **crochet blanket pattern heartland blanket** this gorgeous scrap yarn blanket is the perfect stash buster crochet project made with #4 medium-weight yarn it features an easy mixed stitch repeat alternating colors and a simple border the reversible crochet throw blanket looks beautiful on both sides and the pattern includes instructions to adjust the size for baby blankets throws or bed-sized projects a fun and cozy make for advanced beginners and beyond **pattern attributes** - the pattern is simple complete detailed and thoroughly tested - written in us terms - skill level easy to intermediate - size 36 in width x 47 in length can be made in any size instructions included - yarn type #4 worsted weight yarn - crochet hook h 5 mm - pattern includes a step-by-step detailed written instructions and a photo tutorial
